Making Good Men Better

Gamma Beta National Fraternity is a brotherhood spanning six university campuses across Texas and Oklahoma.

Join Gamma Beta

Six Universities Strong

Our fraternity has six locations across Texas and Oklahoma. We are committed to expanding our reach to other universities and welcoming new members into our brotherhood.

Alpha Chapter

UT Austin

Beta Chapter

Texas Tech University

Gamma Chapter

Texas A&M University

Delta Chapter

University of Oklahoma

Epsilon Chapter

UT San Antonio

Zeta Chapter

University of Houston

What is Gamma Beta?

Gamma Beta Fraternity was founded in 2000 at UT-Austin. Our nine founders sought to create an unparalleled brotherhood guided by the best of our morals, ideals, and culture.

Lifelong Brothers

We believe in achieving more through a community of close friends offering support and encouragement.

Professional Network

GB alumni succeed across many industries and offer mentorship and guidance to new brothers.

Personal Growth

Dedicated to becoming better men through leadership, academics, and community service.

Academic Excellence

Through study and mentorship, we foster a culture of learning and academic growth within our brotherhood.

Campus Involvement

We believe in the importance of being active and engaged members of our campus community.

National Events

We gather every semester to bond with brothers from other schools. Each summer, we host a National Convention.

Learning Opportunities

Learning opportunities in Gamma Beta extend beyond the classroom to help them grow personally and professionally.

Founded in 2000

Gamma Beta was founded in 2000 at UT-Austin by nine student leaders, leading to our unified motto – "GB00".

Cultural Pride

We take pride in our Asian heritage, the diversity of our brotherhood, and our unique backgrounds and experiences.

Brothers with Sisters

Our sister sorority, Lambda Delta Psi, shares our commitment to growth, culture, and community.

Philanthropy

We partner with the Jade Ribbon Campaign to raise awareness about HBV and liver cancer in the API community.

Join Gamma Beta

Join our fraternity and become a part of a legacy that is committed to Making Good Men Better.

How to Join

Gamma Beta National Fraternity.
